Package dk.via.sep.client.networking.eventClient

Class EventClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.via.sep.client.networking.eventClient.EventClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventClient, EventClientCallback, Subject, java.rmi.Remote
    public class EventClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventClient, EventClientCallback

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventClientImpl()
      Public constructor used to initialize the property change support so it can fire events.

      • EventClientImpl

    • Method Detail

      • startClient

        public void startClient()
        Start method used to make this class remotely available for the server to call methods on it. It also initializes the connection to the server by making use of the Connection class to get access to the server factory interface, whilst also registering this client for general and specific callbacks.
        Specified by:
        startClient in interface EventClient

      • createEvent

        public void createEvent​(Event event)
        Method used to create an event and add it into the database.
        Specified by:
        createEvent in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be created.

      • removeEvent

        public void removeEvent​(Event event)
        Method used to remove an event from the database.
        Specified by:
        removeEvent in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be removed.

      • editEvent

        public void editEvent​(Event oldEvent)
        Method used to edit an event. You must have the changes already applied, after which this event will be compared with the full list in the database, and the event that you edited will be replaced by the parameter.
        Specified by:
        editEvent in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        oldEvent - the event to be edited, with the changes already applied to it.

      • getEventList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getEventList()
        Deprecated.
        use the async version instead.
        Method used to get the list of events from the server.
        Specified by:
        getEventList in interface EventClient
        Returns:
        the list of events.

      • joinEvent

        public boolean joinEvent​(User user,
                         Event event,
                         boolean b)
        Method used to join the currently logged in user to an event.
        Specified by:
        joinEvent in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be joined.
        event - the event to join to.
        b - boolean that specifies if the user wants a bus seat or not.
        Returns:
        boolean if the user was successfully joined or not to the event.

      • leaveEvent

        public boolean leaveEvent​(User user,
                          Event event)
        Method used to remove the currently logged in user from an event.
        Specified by:
        leaveEvent in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be removed.
        event - the event to be removed from.
        Returns:
        boolean if the user was successfully removed or not.

      • getUserList

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList​(Event event)
        Method used to ge the list of users from the database.
        Specified by:
        getUserList in interface EventClient
        Parameters:
        event - the event to get the list from.
        Returns:
        the list of users.

      • getEventListAsync

        public void getEventListAsync()
        Method used to get the list of events asynchronous from the server. Calls a method on the server that fetches the event list, then calls the retrieveEventList method below to provide the list as a parameter.
        Specified by:
        getEventListAsync in interface EventClient

      • eventCreated

        public void eventCreated​(Event event)
        Method used to notify the user that an event has been created.
        Specified by:
        eventCreated in interface EventClientCallback
        Parameters:
        event - the event that has been created.

        Parameters:
        event - the removed event.

      • retrieveEventList

        public void retrieveEventList​(java.util.ArrayList<Event> events)
        Method called remotely by the server to provide the event list. This method will only be called if the getEventListAsync() method is called first.
        Specified by:
        retrieveEventList in interface EventClientCallback
        Parameters:
        events - the list of events.
